front.title: ARPANET users interest working group meeting

author.organization: University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA), New Media Centers (NMC)
Bolt Beranek and Newman Inc. (BBN), Network Control Center (NET)
Stanford Research Institute (SRI), Augmentation Research Center (ARC)

abstract.t: A new group, the Arpanet Users Interest Working Group (USING) is the outgrowth of a meeting held in Boston on May 22-23, 1973.
